User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Aura music application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

Admin.title: Admin
Admin.description: Represents an admin user. The document ID should be the user's UID.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate admin status, should always be true.

addedAt.description: The timestamp when the user was made an admin.

Song.title: Song
Song.description: Represents a song in the user's music library or a general catalog.

url.description: URL where the song can be accessed (e.g., YouTube or SoundCloud link).

type.description: The service that hosts the music. This will tell us the type of song source.

videoId.description: The video ID for YouTube songs.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the song was added.

CatalogSong.title: CatalogSong
CatalogSong.description: Represents a song in the public catalog.

url.description: URL where the song can be accessed (e.g., YouTube, SoundCloud, or MP3 link).

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single chat message for a specific song.

text.description: The content of the chat message.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was sent.

/admins/{userId}.description: Stores a list of admin user UIDs.

/artifacts/Aura/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles, including email and display name.

/artifacts/Aura/users/{userId}/songs/{so.description: Stores songs specific to each user.

/artifacts/Aura/songs/{songId}/messages/.description: Stores chat messages for a specific song.

/artifacts/Aura/catalog/{songId}.description: Stores the public music catalog, managed by admins.
